import httpx
from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

from langflow.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from langflow.inputs import MessageTextInput
from langflow.schema import Data
from langflow.field_typing import Tool
from langchain.tools import StructuredTool

class WAHASendTextMessageComponent(LCToolComponent):
    display_name = "WAHA - Send Text Message"
    description = "Sends a text message to a specific chat using the WAHA API."
    icon = "message-circle-more"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="base_url",
            display_name="Base URL",
            info="The base URL of the WAHA API.",
            value="http://localhost:3000",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session",
            display_name="Session",
            info="The session name.",
            value="default",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="chat_id",
            display_name="Chat ID",
            info="The ID of the chat to send the message to.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="text",
            display_name="Message Text",
            info="The text content of the message to send.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="reply_to",
            display_name="Reply To",
            info="The ID of the message to reply to (optional).",
            advanced=True,
        ),
    ]

    class WAHASendTextMessageSchema(BaseModel):
        chat_id: str = Field(..., description="The ID of the chat to send the message to.")
        text: str = Field(..., description="The text content of the message to send.")
        reply_to: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="The ID of the message to reply to (optional).")

    def run_model(self) -> Data:
        sent_message = self._send_text_message(self.chat_id, self.text, self.reply_to)
        return Data(data=sent_message)

    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        return StructuredTool.from_function(
            name="waha_send_text_message",
            description="Sends a text message to a specific chat using the WAHA API.",
            func=self._send_text_message,
            args_schema=self.WAHASendTextMessageSchema,
        )

    def _send_text_message(self, chat_id: str, text: str, reply_to: Optional[str] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        url = f"{self.base_url}/api/sendText"
        payload = {
            "chatId": chat_id,
            "text": text,
            "session": self.session,
        }
        if reply_to:
            payload["reply_to"] = reply_to

        headers = {
            "X-Api-Key": "{{apiKey}}",  # Replace with actual API key handling
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
        }

        self.log(f"Sending POST request to {url}")
        with httpx.Client() as client:
            response = client.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
        response.raise_for_status()
        sent_message = response.json()

        self.log("Message sent successfully")
        return sent_message
